name: Herdey
description:
Made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50 with the theme "Delay the inevitable"

Herdey is a fluffball herding game, scavenge items around the yard (in the shed) to try and keep the fluffballs from inevitably escaping!

This game should work with any SteamVR compatible VR headset.

The controls are displayed on the wall of the shed in-game.
